casebody.data:
No. 10-9976. Carl A. Knight, Petitioner v. United States District Court for the Western District of Pennsylvania. 563 U.S. 1002, 131 S. Ct. 2481,

179 L. Ed. 2d 1236,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 3565, May 16, 2011.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit denied.

Justice Kagan took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Same case below, 401 Fed. Appx. 633.
